function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19 through global travel","Impact":"Severe impact on public health and economies","Mitigation":"Implement strict travel restrictions and mandatory testing/quarantine measures","Technologies":"Advanced testing and contact tracing technologies","People":"Travellers, business professionals, leisure travellers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Congestion on road networks contributing to disease propagation","Impact":"Increased close contact and transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improve road infrastructure to reduce congestion, promote remote work, and encourage public transportation","Technologies":"Traffic management systems, remote work technologies, public transportation infrastructure","People":"Road users, commuters, transportation authorities","Owner":"Transportation authorities, employers, urban planners"},{"Description":"Construction projects creating potential infection hotspots","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among construction workers and local communities","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, provide testing and protective equipment to workers, and minimize community exposure","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, wearable technology for social distancing monitoring, construction site ventilation systems","People":"Construction workers, local residents","Owner":"Construction companies, local authorities, public health authorities"}]}
